attributes.action: Stop the forced practice of ear tagging livestock
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are a group of smallholders that are upset with being forced to ear tag our livestock. Ear tags place unnecessary pain and suffering upon animals. Tagging results in open wounds and at times the animal rips the tag out completely, thereby having to go through the distressing process all over again. We beleive that micro-chipping could replace tagging, as a more reliable, less cruel way to identify livestock.
